name: SuperKampfBATTLE
description:
This one is for bored people who want to play a quick game against someone else. You jump all over the screen while shooting each other.

The controls are simple: One player uses W, A, S, and space to move around and shoot while the other uses the arrow keys and control. Only a keyboard and no controllers are needed.

You decide how long a game takes by selecting how much health each player has. If you are a pro and play against a player who is less familliar with gaming you can simply set the other players' health to be a lot higher than yours so it's still a fun and challenging experience for both players!
